org.apache.cassandra.net

Class RateBasedBackPressure

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cassandra.net.RateBasedBackPressure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BackPressureStrategy<org.apache.cassandra.net.RateBasedBackPressureState>

    public class RateBasedBackPressure
extends java.lang.Object
implements BackPressureStrategy<org.apache.cassandra.net.RateBasedBackPressureState>
    Back-pressure algorithm based on rate limiting according to the ratio between incoming and outgoing rates, computed over a sliding time window with size equal to write RPC timeout.
